price: 118. Verily, you have (a promise from Us) that you will never be hungry therein nor naked.
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: inna laka allā tajūʿa fīhā walā taʿrā
